title: Textile, ca. 1919
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: satin and short weft floats
creditline: Anonymous bequest in memory of Albert and Rebecca Elsberg
description: Four samples with moire ground. Meander-like design with lines of "rackle" in satin and short weft floats. Both selvages present on all samples.
